original_text: The one who receives a prophet because he is a prophet will receive a prophet's reward, and the one who receives a righteous person because he is a righteous person will receive a righteous person's reward.
korean_text: 선지자의 이름으로 선지자를 영접하는 자는 선지자의 상을 받을 것이요 의인의 이름으로 의인을 영접하는 자는 의인의 상을 받을 것이요

sentences.original_text: The one who receives a prophet
and the one who receives a righteous person
because he is a righteous person
will receive a righteous person's reward
